short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remind you and make you learn new knowledge everyday, a bite at a time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension, once you created an account, will suggests three new lessons for you to learn about your interested topics every day. For example, three or more new vocabulary with quiz every day.

It will show a reminder in your browser if you don't finish the lesson, so that you don't need to open another app or another website, and that you will be less likely to skip lessons.
